title: Using Quick Filter causes Thunderbird to stop responding
content: I usually search my emails using the Quick Filter function, but now when I do Thunderbird goes into "not responding" mode and it never resolves. Can anyone help me solve this issue? Have I acquired a bug? If so, what should I do? Thanks for any suggestions you have! Diane
creator: goldhatpin

title: Port settings
content: Can you supply the port settings for incoming and outgoing email account?
creator: charleysteve10

title: Reinstall of Thundebird didn't correct my problem.
content: I have had Thunderbird for several years. For some reason, it got to where Thunderbird wouldn't allow me to send out emails. It would retrieve them, but I couldn't send out. I tried fixing it to the the limit of my knowledge of these matters - and I could have made things worse - but nothing worked. Finally, I deleted what I thought was the entire Thunderbird program and downloaded new / reinstalled. Unfortunately, I still have the same issue. Any advice? Thanks.
creator: dnpcorp

title: write new email in same window?
content:
im new to thunderbird.

when replying to emails, there is a new window that pop ups.

isnt in possible to reply to emails in same window as where we read them from?

title: How do I easily transfer all my settings to this new upgraded profile #11?
content: How do I easily transfer all my settings to this new upgraded Thunderbird profile #11? I just got the message and don't want to lose any of my data. I can't use my email account now.
creator: sidnee

title: Sending Emails
content: A message showed when I was trying to send an email saying my outbox has been blacklisted. How do I fix this Sending of the message failed. An error occurred while sending mail: Outgoing server (SMTP) error. The server responded: Connection refused - OB119. 60.224.7.86 is blacklisted in Abusix Mail Intelligence. See https://lookup.abusix.com/search?q=60.224.7.86 e{13a44773-d11c-4474-b4df-ab1147816018}.
creator: warrenandsuesiv
